general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid exposure outside during the peak heat hours of the day. Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: After the monsoon rainfall, prepare the land and start sowing different pulses in the field.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm.
Choose the variety according to land type and resources available.
In areas where rain is received, go for sowing the Dhaincha seeds @ 10kg/ac which should be incorporated in the field at 3 weeks stage prior to main kharif crop cultivation.
Due to temperature effect, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm.
Due to weather, there may be an attack of Mites, to manage this, spray Dicofol.
Prepare poison baits for white flies by mixing Malathion and Jaggery in water.
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac. The seed material should be of 150-200g. Prepare the well-pulverized field and make pits for planting.
